languages.text: "Не сомневайтесь в моих методах, губернатор. Я не собираюсь опустошать ваш мир — в конце концов, он должен и дальше платить десятину".
"Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."
languages.original_text: "Не сомневайтесь в моих методах, губернатор. Я не собираюсь опустошать ваш мир — в конце концов, он должен и дальше платить десятину".

traits.locale_text: "Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it must be able to continue paying the tithe."
"Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it must be able to continue paying the tithe."
"Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."
"Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."
"Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."
"Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."

languages.text: "Vertraut auf meine Methoden, Gouverneur. Ich werde Eure Welt nicht entvölkern ... sie wird schließlich noch gebraucht, um den Zehnt zu entrichten."
languages.original_text: "Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Vertraut auf meine Methoden, Gouverneur. Ich werde Eure Welt nicht entvölkern ... sie wird schließlich noch gebraucht, um den Zehnt zu entrichten."

languages.text: « Faites confiance à mes méthodes, gouverneur. Je n'ai pas l'intention de dépeupler votre monde. Il doit pouvoir continuer à payer la dîme, après tout. »
languages.original_text: "Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."

traits.locale_text: « Faites confiance à mes méthodes, gouverneur. Je n'ai pas l'intention de dépeupler votre monde. Il doit pouvoir continuer à payer la dîme, après tout. »

languages.text: «Tenga fe en mis métodos, gobernador. No pretendo despoblar su planeta; después de todo, alguien tiene que seguir pagando el diezmo».
languages.original_text: "Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."

traits.locale_text: «Tenga fe en mis métodos, gobernador. No pretendo despoblar su planeta; después de todo, alguien tiene que seguir pagando el diezmo».

languages.text: “请相信我的手段，总督。我不打算削减这颗行星的人口数量，毕竟，我们得确保这个世界依然有能力缴纳什一税。”
languages.original_text: "Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."

traits.locale_text: “请相信我的手段，总督。我不打算削减这颗行星的人口数量，毕竟，我们得确保这个世界依然有能力缴纳什一税。”

languages.text: 「私のやり方を信じてください、総督。あなたの惑星の人口を減らすつもりはありません。租税を徴収し続けるためには、ある程度の人口が必要ですから」
languages.original_text: "Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."

traits.locale_text: 「私のやり方を信じてください、総督。あなたの惑星の人口を減らすつもりはありません。租税を徴収し続けるためには、ある程度の人口が必要ですから」

languages.text: "Yöntemlerime güvenin Vali Bey. Niyetim, dünyanızı insandan yoksun bırakmak değil. Nihayetinde aşar ödemeye devam etmeniz gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "Have faith in my methods, Governor. I am not going to depopulate your world — after all, it needs to be able to continue paying the tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Yöntemlerime güvenin Vali Bey. Niyetim, dünyanızı insandan yoksun bırakmak değil. Nihayetinde aşar ödemeye devam etmeniz gerekiyor."
